description:
ALL LOCKDOWN FINES IN ITALY WILL LIKELY BE VOIDED FOR A TOTAL OF €324 MILLIONS!
A friend from #Italy sent me this good news. Italy has gone through one of the toughest #lockdowns on the planet and fines were €400 !
The far-left government used the same scare tactics used in Victoria, with police and drones checking every aspect of our lives.
People have been taking every fine to court and in Frosinone the Judge has voided the fines because there are no legal grounds for fining people under State of Emergency.
Full article: https://www.quotidianodellumbria.it/quotidiano/perugia/coronavirus/annullate-multe-del-lockdown

 #pandemic #plandemic2020 #covidscam #covid #covid19 #virus #freedom #nofacemask  #wakeupaustralia #Melbourne #Victoria #Australia #fakenews
#sackdanielandrews #dictatorship #idonotconsent #nojabnopay
